section.section: The local board shall provide election judges with detailed procedures for the closing of the polls, specific to the voting system used.

text.section: If election results are produced in the polling place, the election judge shall admit watchers to hear the announced results.
A chief judge shall release an election judge from duty after the completion of the election judge's assigned tasks.
